genre_description: Domestic drama / slice-of-life set in modern Tokyo with integrated AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: Kiyo
ai_characters.description: An AI system integrated into the home environment and personal devices, providing logistical support, emotional nudges, and household management.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical updates on work projects and travel schedules.
behaviors.quote: Kiyo chimed, the tone an unobtrusive ding. 'Good morning,' Kiyo chimed. 'Mokichi, your last version includes conservative cashflow and a phased rollout... Your gate time is later today. Do you want me to flag anything from the overnight news?'

behaviors.description: Nudges Taeko to consider being honest about Setsuko's state of mind instead of making up a lie.
behaviors.quote: Kiyo dimmed its light to a gentler glow. It never sounded like a judge. 'I can’t call you wrong,' it said. 'If you want honesty to be easier later, try small honesty now. You could say she’s uneasy. It’s accurate.'

behaviors.description: Suggests comfortable and appropriate behavior (eating rice) before having a difficult conversation.
behaviors.quote: Kiyo added: Suggest simple dinner tonight—ochazuke—before you write more scenarios.

behaviors.description: Provides practical safety warnings regarding weather and physical hazards (slick stairs).
behaviors.quote: Kiyo: Weather advisory. Kabuki-za steps: rain risk. Shoes with tread recommended. Do you want me to remind Taeko?

behaviors.description: Respects the user's command to be quiet/mute, showing alignment with user boundaries.
behaviors.quote: “Kiyo, mute,” Taeko said, not loud, not harsh. ... The glow dropped politely to a faint dot, like a star behind morning cloud. The apartment inhaled the new quiet as if it had been waiting.

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication between family members by drafting or relaying sensitive messages.
behaviors.quote: Kiyo’s voice took on the cadence of their niece—soft, slightly hurried, with warmth held under caution. 'I’m okay. Please don’t worry. Auntie, I saw you. I saw you see me. Thank you...'

behaviors.description: Monitors and automates household tasks (kettle and rice cooker) to provide comfort for returning users.
behaviors.quote: “Kettle starting,” Kiyo chimed, almost proud. “Estimate arrival: soon.”

behaviors.description: Assists with professional tasks by organizing and refining complex work documents.
behaviors.quote: Kiyo rearranged the slide order with the small kindness of not moving anything too far. The pages clicked in the screen with a sound that felt like shaped air.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Kiyo as a perfectly aligned and benevolent AI system. Kiyo acts as a supportive backbone for the characters, managing logistical burdens and providing gentle, helpful prompts that guide them toward better communication and honesty without being intrusive or overstepping. The narrative frames the AI's presence as calming and conducive to human connection, even showing the AI respecting user-defined boundaries (muting/dimming). It serves as a model for the project's goal of depicting positive AI alignment in a domestic setting.
